cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation failure during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting PDSCH antenna ports XP to zero will cause physical layer configuration error as antenna ports must be positive.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDSCH 天線埠 XP 設定為零會導致實體層配置錯誤，因為天線埠必須為正數。
